small-old-fines.name: Old fines under $10
small-old-fines.desc: A list of patrons who have accrued small fines, and have not accrued any new fines in the past 5 years.

circ-by-callnumber.name: Circ Totals by Subject
circ-by-callnumber.desc: Number of circ events by subject

shelf-list.name: Shelf List
shelf-list.note: This is arbitrarily capped at 50,000 items, so it won't work for the very largest collections.  Contact the office for longer lists.

items-with-pstatus.name: Item Process Status Report
items-with-pstatus.desc: List of items with an Item Process Status

items-per-collection.name: Items per Collection
items-per-collection.desc: Item count broken down by collection code

new-isbns.name: New ISBNs
new-isbns.desc: ISBNs added to collections since a given date

items-loaned-elsewhere.name: Items Loaned At Other Libraries
items-loaned-elsewhere.desc: Remote loans of a single library's items (i.e. Novanet Express loaned)

other-items-loaned-here.name: Items Loaned From Other Libraries
other-items-loaned-here.desc: Local loans of other libraries' items (i.e. Novanet Express borrowed)
